title: Spell vamp, just vlad things.
body:
http://imgur.com/wCweimP

So uh... I thought spell vamp was an unique passive.

Is this a bug? I had WOTA, gunblade, revolver, spirit visage, vlad's e (4 stacks), spell vamp runes and perhaps masteries.

It was a pretty fun game lol

thoughts?

replies.body:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Unique

Unnamed unique passives won't stack if you have multiple of the same item, but they will stack between different items.

For example:
{{item:3145}} + {{item:3152}} = 32% Spell Vamp
{{item:3152}} + {{item:3152}}  = 20% Spell Vamp

It's kinda like how CDR is usually a unique stat on items, but you can stack CDR if you have it from different items.

----------------------------------------
tl;dr Working as intended.
I do that with Morgana. She deals more damage and at a quicker pace so she heals like crazy.
So what... did you die at all late game? Unless you are ignited I can see that vlad sustaining forever on a teamfight, E evryone wait 3 sec, E again and recover all the hp lost in the 3 sec.

There are exceptions to the rule

Another example are sheen items.

They all stack, kinda.

If you get a trinity and an iceborn, you keep the 200% proc from trinity, and that is applied to the AoE from iceborn.

If you get a Lichbane and an Iceborn, you apply the lichbane passive over the AoE

Lichbane and Trinity do not stack, Lichbane will always override trinity.  

So that guy you made fun of for getting a gauntlet and a trinity force? He was actually building correctly lol
You broke it. Everyone can go home now. You won league.
